alert.note: Alert for Des Moines; Henry; Louisa; Muscatine; Scott (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 23 at 8:24PM CST until December 24 at 6:00AM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Significant blowing and drifting snow expected. Northwest winds could gust as high as 45 mph. Ground blizzard conditions are possible in open and rural areas. Extremely cold wind chills are expected with values as cold as 25 to 35 below. * WHERE...Portions of north central, northwest and west central Illinois, east central and southeast Iowa and northeast Missouri. * WHEN...Until 6 AM CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Dangerously cold wind chills as low as 35 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 to 20 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Impacts from the combined effects of the wind and snow are expected. Thus, blizzard conditions will be possible in open and rural areas. Plan holiday travel after the wind and blowing snow diminish if possible.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Des Moines; Henry; Louisa; Muscatine; Scott
